title: On the Casimir of the group ISL(n,R) and its algebraic decomposition
abstract: In this article a formula for the Casimir of ISL(n,R) is given. This algebraic expression is useful in the classification of particles in a theory based on ISL(n,R). It is also proven that the Casimir of ISL(n,R) can be decomposed in terms of the Casimir of its little groups, a key point in the posterior construction of its irreducible representations.
